Subskills.name: Empowered Toxin
Subskills.description: Increases poisoned damage inflicted by envenom.

Subskills.name: Stacked Weakness
Subskills.description: Inflict stacking poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Toxic Afterburst
Subskills.description: Chance for a fissure to burst twice on hit.

Subskills.name: Lifesap
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a venomous nova dealing a portion of the target's life as damage.

Subskills.name: Toxic Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of envenom.

Subskills.name: Spreading Disease
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional envenom on a nearby monster on hit.

Subskills.name: Venomwave
Subskills.description: Unleash waves of fissures from targets dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Venom Overflow
Subskills.description: Chance to increase poisoned damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Rapid End
Subskills.description: Increases poisoned damage and the tick frequency of poisoned.

Subskills.name: Envenova
Subskills.description: Unleash a poisonous nova instead with increased damage.
